channel.title: Transparency ... help
channel.description:
Hello I was wondering if it was possible to change the transparency key for bitmaps, I have black text and I would like for it to not be transparent, but instead a different color be transparent.... is there any way of doing this?
is that what "mask color" is when you do bitmap -> string?
thanks

item.title: Transparency ... help
item.dc:creator: @yomama yomama`
item.description:
@yomama wrote:

Thank you.

but how do I “set” this “mask color”?

O_o

Read full topic

item.title: Transparency ... help
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“yomama`, post:1, topic:87332”]Hello I was wondering if it was possible to change the transparency key for bitmaps, I have black text and I would like for it to not be transparent, but instead a different color be transparent… is there any way of doing this?

is that what “mask color” is when you do bitmap -> string?

thanks[/quote]

Mask color I believe is transparency, say you put the mask color to 175284, that color will be transparent.

Also, have you tried including more around the black text?

Read full topic
